Package main_module.model.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main_module.model.entities.Entity
main_module.model.entities.Character
main_module.model.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdate
public class Player extends Character
Represents the player character in the game.

      Creates a new instance of the Player class.
      Parameters:
      pos - The initial position of the player.
      hp - The initial health points of the player.
      bombManager - The bomb manager associated with the player.
